title: St Emilion macarons
description: This decadent and impressive dessert combines wine and chocolate for a grown-up take on mousse.For this recipe you will need silicone paper, a sugar thermometer, an electric whisk and a piping bag fitted with a 7mm plain nozzle.
ingredients: 150g/5oz good-quality plain chocolate (minimum 70% cocoa solids), broken into pieces
150ml/5fl oz good-quality red wine, ideally St Emilion or Merlot
